Class ServiceableTransformer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cocoon.util.AbstractLogEnabled

                  org.apache.cocoon.transformation.ServiceableTransformer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, Disposable, LexicalHandler, Poolable, Recyclable, Serviceable, org.apache.cocoon.sitemap.SitemapModelComponent, org.apache.cocoon.transformation.Transformer, XMLConsumer, org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLConsumer, org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLPipe, org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLProducer
public abstract class ServiceableTransformer
extends AbstractTransformer
implements Serviceable, Disposable

This class can be used as a base class for own transformer implementations that need to lookup other components.

Version:
$Id: ServiceableTransformer.java 587751 2007-10-24 02:41:36Z vgritsenko $
